ComicInfo.Title: Four: Soul Burn Slow
ComicInfo.Summary:
New York is rocked by a massive wizard’s duel like you’ve never seen before! What secrets are Spencer Dales and Aaron Mills hiding from each other? And who among the Aegis stands to profit?
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-------------------------------|-------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Khary Randolph & Emilio Lopez | 1 | | B | Visions of Excellence Cover B | John Christmas | 2 |
